title: DR. MARCO PARET'S NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS SCHOOL / HYPNOTIZE WHOEVER YOU WANT
description:
In more than twenty five years of experience in the field, Dr. Marco Paret developed new techniques, new methodologies that have contributed to the practice of thousands of his students. Dr. Marco is an internationally recognized trainer. His courses are unique, certified & beneficial for students of any level. These are suitable for both practicing therapists (hypnotherapists, counsellors, alternative therapy practitioners etc.) as well as for individuals wanting greater empowerment in their life. You can find our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism. 

Check out some other videos on our channel: 
https://youtu.be/d2SWiRj0E78   
https://youtu.be/FYJaz_RZdso
